[color=#93c47d][size=5]Grass settings [/size][/color]


Put these settings in skyrim.ini


[Grass]
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=3
iMinGrassSize=60    
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=18000.0000
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=0.0000


[size=4]Less dense settings
[/size]
[Grass]
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=2
iMinGrassSize=60
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=18000.0000
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=0.0000

iMinGrassSize=60     (75 for more fps)



Optimized textures
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87887/
[size=5]Thank you  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3757297]spoknot99[/url]
